Text: RE Thank youVince Took a few days to get back to you This guys works for the US Sales VP our contact at Samsung Samsung is going to send him out to review the business and present his ideas Ill let you know how it goes Brad Original Message From Kaminski Vince J Sent Tuesday October AM To Brooks Bradford Cc Simmons Michael Subject FW Thank you Brad I am sending you a resume of a student from Berkeley you may find interesting Vince Original Message From Sam Seung Hyun Cho ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESSamCSeungHyunCChoCschohaasEberkeleyEeduE NRONcom Sent Friday October AM To Subject Thank you Dear DrKaminski It was really nice to talk to you tonight Tonight my willingness to explore Enrons innovative culture became much stronger To your question who will sell it my answer is Enron will sell it My current idea is to create hedging portfolio against DRAM price movement and sell the insurance based on the payoffs from the hedging portfolio FYI I attach my resume Thank you very much Best regards Sam Seung Hyun Cho MBA MFE Walter A Haas School of Business University of California Berkeley ChoSamEnrondoc File ChoSamEnrondoc
